summary.span: 表示 控件在运行时绘制的表。

span.span: Represents the table drawn by the control at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件以网格形式显示数据。The control displays data in the form of a grid. 是一个类，表示绘制的网格。The is a class that represents the drawn grid only. 此网格不应混淆和类，该类是可能的网格的数据源。This grid should not be confused with the class, which is a possible source of data for the grid. 相反，严格表示控件中绘制的网格。Instead, the strictly represents the grid as it is painted in the control. 因此，通过您可以控制每个网格的外观。Therefore, through the you can control the appearance of the grid for each . 若要指定哪些显示从特定的数据时使用，请设置到的。To specify which is used when displaying data from a particular , set the to the of a . 通过检索属性包含所有使用对象控件。The retrieved through the property contains all the objects used by a control. 集合可以包含任意多个对象，如需要但是的每个必须是唯一的。The collection can contain as many objects as you need, however the of each must be unique. 在运行时，这使你可以用不同为相同的数据，具体取决于用户的首选项。At run time, this allows you to substitute a different for the same data, depending on the user's preference. 具体方法为：To do this: 1. 填充与对象。Populate the with objects. 如果中存在其属性的值等于对象的属性，显示与此。If a exists in the whose property value equals the object's property, the is displayed with this . 如果没有存在并以匹配，则显示与数据网格表的默认样式。If no exists with a matching , the is displayed with the default style for data grid tables. 2. 当需要不同的网格样式时，使用`Item`属性选择相应(传递到属性) 并设置返回的对象为新值。When a different grid style is needed, use the `Item` property to select the appropriate (pass the to the property) and set the of the returned object to a new value. 3. 使用属性来选择所需，并设置其到的。Use the property to select the desired , and set its to the of the . > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建对象，并将其添加到添加之前对象添加到。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 当添加一个空使用一个有效值到集合中，为你自动生成的对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常具有重复的对象值到。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 若要确定哪个是当前显示，请使用并的属性返回。To determine which is currently displayed, use the and properties of the to return a . 如果数据源实现接口，可以使用方法以返回的当前表。If the data source implements the interface, you can use the method to return the of the current table. 下面的 C# 代码所示：This is shown in the C# code below: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` 如果包含通过相关对象对象和当前显示是子表中， TableName.RelationName 形式 （在最简单的情况下） 将返回的字符串。If the contains objects related through objects, and the currently displayed is a child table, the will return a string in the form of TableName.RelationName (in the simplest case). 如果是进一步在层次结构中的字符串将包含父表名称后跟所需的达到表的级别所需的值。If the is further down in the hierarchy, the string will consist of the parent table's name followed by the necessary values required to reach the table's level. 例如，假设有三个层次结构关系名为 （顶部到底部） 中的对象`Regions`， `Customers`，和`Orders`，并将两个名为的对象`RegionsToCustomers`和`CustomersToOrders`， 属性将返回"Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders"。For example, imagine three objects in a hierarchical relationship named (top to bottom) `Regions`, `Customers`, and `Orders`, and two objects named `RegionsToCustomers` and `CustomersToOrders`, the property will return "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders". 但是，然后将"订单"。However, the will then be "Orders". 集合通过返回的对象属性的。The collection of objects is returned through the property of the . 当将显示的设置将重写的设置控件。When a is displayed, the settings for the will override the settings for the control. 如果值未设置为特定属性，将改为使用控件的值。If a value is not set for a particular property, the control's value will be used instead. 以下列表显示属性可以设置以替代控制属性：The following list shows the properties that can be set to override control properties: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要将绑定对象类型必须为强类型化对象的数组，包含公共属性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要创建显示数组时，设置属性设置为`typename`其中`typename`被替换为对象类型的名称。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 另请注意，属性是区分大小写; 必须完全匹配的类型名称。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 请参阅属性有关的示例。See the property for an example. 此外可以绑定到。You can also bind the to an . 一项功能是可以包含多个类型的对象，但只能绑定到此列表的第一项与相同类型的列表中的所有项时。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 这意味着所有对象必须都是同一类型，或者它们必须从列表中的第一项与相同的类继承。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果在列表中的第一项，第二个项目会(它是从)。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 另一方面，如果第一项是，第二个对象不能为。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，绑定和中的对象时必须具有在其中的项必须包含公共属性。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound and the objects in the must contain public properties. 一个空将导致一个空网格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 绑定到时，将的到"ArrayList"（类型名称）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建两个实例并设置到每个对象的的中。The following code example creates two instances and sets the of each object to the of a in a . 然后该示例添加对象添加到每个。The example then adds objects to the of each . 运行示例，请参阅示例。For an example that runs, see the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，指示排序方向的每个列标题中显示的三角形。When the property is set to `true`, a triangle appears in each column header indicating the direction of the sort. 用户可以单击任何列标题以按该列对网格进行排序。The user can click on any column header to sort the grid by that column. 单击第二个时间的列更改排序的方向。Clicking the column a second time changes the direction of the sort. 此属性将替代属性。This property overrides the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例，可在切换排序可用性通过单击一个按钮和当前分类状态显示在标签中。The following code example allows you to toggle sorting availability on a by clicking a button and the current sorting status is displayed in a label. 此示例要求具有与，其中包含一些数据和一个上。This example requires that you have a with a that contains some data, a and a on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将绑定对象类型必须为强类型化对象的数组，包含公共属性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要创建显示数组时，设置属性设置为`typename`其中`typename`被替换为对象类型的名称。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 另请注意，属性是区分大小写; 必须完全匹配的类型名称。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 请参阅属性有关的示例。See the property for an example. 此外可以绑定到。You can also bind the to an . 一项功能是可以包含多个类型的对象，但只能绑定到此列表的第一项与相同类型的列表中的所有项时。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 这意味着所有对象必须都是同一类型，或者它们必须从列表中的第一项与相同的类继承。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果在列表中的第一项，第二个项目会(它是从)。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 另一方面，如果第一项是，第二个对象不能为。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，时它所绑定必须具有在其中的项。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound. 一个空将导致一个空网格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 绑定到时，将的到"ArrayList"（类型名称）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). 默认值是由管理的列表的名称此网格。The default is the name of the list managed by the for this grid. 有关使用设置构造函数。The for the is set using the constructor. 事件发生时值发生更改。The event occurs when the value changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的数组`Widget`对象，并将绑定到数组的控件。The following code example creates an array of `Widget` objects and binds a control to the array. 该代码随后创建，并设置类加方括号的名称。The code then creates a and sets the to the name of the class plus brackets. [!code-cpp[DataGridTable.MappingName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTable.MappingName Example/CPP/bindarray.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTable.MappingName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTable.MappingName Example/CS/bindarray.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTable.MappingName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTable.MappingName Example/VB/bindarray.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
